member.name: P:LogMeIn.Infrastructure.ServerEnvironment.ServerConfig.DataCenterId
member.summary: Gets the id of the datacenter in which the web application is running.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.Infrastructure.ServerEnvironment.ServerConfig.DebugMode
member.summary: Gets whether application debugging is enabled.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.Infrastructure.ServerEnvironment.ServerConfig.LoopbackAddress
member.summary: Gets the base IP address URL for the current request.
member.remarks: The return value has a trailing slash.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.Infrastructure.ServerEnvironment.ServerConfig.RootFolder
member.summary: Gets the physical root folder of the application.
member.remarks: The return value has no trailing slashes.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.Infrastructure.ServerEnvironment.ServerConfig.PreferredUrl
member.remarks: The returned URL ends with a trailing slash.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.Infrastructure.ServerEnvironment.ServerConfig.RequestBaseUrl
member.summary: Gets the base domain URL for the current request.
member.remarks: The returned URL ends with a trailing slash.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.Infrastructure.ServerEnvironment.ServerConfig.ServerName
member.summary: Gets the (NetBIOS) name of the server.
